version_description:
1. Added OPML Import & Export support;
2. Now you can leave comments in channels & episodes;
3. Stability performance improvements and bug fixes.

1. Added OPML Import & Export support;
2. Now you can leave comments in channels & episodes;
3. Stability performance improvements and bug fixes.

1. Now you can add a RSS feed in the search box and subscribe to it.
2. Added “Categories” and “Audiobooks” in the “Discover” page.
3. Added “New Releases” feature.
4. The mini playbar in the bottom can hidden by sliding up, and appear by sliding

1. Added “Networks” in the “Discover” page.
2. Optimized loading speed.
3. Stability performance improvements and bug fixes.

1. Now you can sign in with your email.
2. Added “Dark Theme”.
3. You can search episodes within the channel by keywords.
4. Optimized Playlist.
5. Improved UX of the playback bar.
6. Stability performance improvements and bug fixes.

Good to see you again here, podcast fans!
In this release, we optimized Community functionality. You can reply to the post attaching a channel or episode; Your posting history now can be found on the profile page.
We are bringing you Zen mode v2.0:

Good to see you again here, podcast fans!

- Zen Mode is here, with this new feature, you would be able to relax and fall asleep better. More than 100 nature sounds available, play alone or remix, try to make your own sleep trigger！
Our Software

1. AirPlay2 Support: Now you can listen to podcasts and control playback on multiple speakers.
2. Stability performance improvements and bug fixes.

1. Now you can sign in with your email.
2. Added “Dark Theme”.
3. You can search episodes within the channel by keywords.
4. Optimized Playlist.
5. Improved UX of the playback bar.
6. Stability performance improvements and bug fixes.

1. Brand new UI design provides unparalleled user experience.
1) Discover page and Search page are merged, enhancing ease of content discovery.
2) New "Listen" page displays "Downloads", "Playlist", "New Releases" and great recommendations.<

1. Optimized Siri Shortcuts: Now you can use Siri Shortcuts to open Castbox and jump to the channel you subscribed to.
2. Redesigned UI for the player for a more simplistic look.
3. Fixed UI for Apple Watch to allow for full-screen display.

1. Our in-app Podcast Community is here — come join the discussion!

-Follow your favorite topics
